rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0001
rows.name: We here, Uka.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0002
rows.name: Hey, Tora, what do you do here?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0003
rows.name: Here is for talk to Divine Beast Archelon!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0004
rows.name:
You can talk to Divine Beasts?
Tora, that's amazing!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0005
rows.name:
Not just Tora.
Uka can do too.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0006
rows.name:
What?!
No way I can talk to a Divine Beast!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0007
rows.name:
I once tried to talk to the Maelstrom's
Divine Beast and it just tried to eat me!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0008
rows.name:
That because Maelstrom Divine Beast only
speak Nopon.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0009
rows.name: What, really?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0010
rows.name: Archelon hear Superbian every day.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0011
rows.name:
So you mean that if we talk to him
normally, he'll understand?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0012
rows.name: Exactly.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0013
rows.name:
Come to think about it, maybe Uka
having problems because Uka
speaking wrong language.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0014
rows.name: Ohh, hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0021
rows.name: What should I say to Uka?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0022
rows.name:
Give it a go, Uka! You
know you want to.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0023
rows.name:
What's in your heart is more important
than the language you speak.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0024
rows.name: What should I say to Uka?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0025
rows.name:
Give it a go.
You never know until you try.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0026
rows.name:
Words don't mean anything. It's
feelings that really count.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0027
rows.name: What should I say to Uka?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0028
rows.name:
You should give it a go. You never
know unless you try.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0029
rows.name:
I believe that feelings speak louder
than words.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0030
rows.name: What should I say to Uka?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0031
rows.name: Go on, give it a go! It's a challenge!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0032
rows.name:
What really matters is how you feel,
not what language you speak.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0101
rows.name:
You're right.
I shouldn't shy away from a challenge!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0102
rows.name: Here we go!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0103
rows.name:
Uhh... Mr. Archelon? My name is Uka.
Very nice to meet you, sir.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0105
rows.name:
You must be angry at the Superbians
for remodeling you like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0106
rows.name: Nobody likes to be forced into stuff...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0107
rows.name:
I bet you just want to be left
alone in peace, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0108
rows.name:
Doesn't look like he can
understand you.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0109
rows.name: Guess he can't understand you.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0110
rows.name: I don't think he's getting it.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0111
rows.name: Was something supposed to happen?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0112
rows.name: Aw...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0113
rows.name:
Well, whether he can hear me or not,
how is he supposed to respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0115
rows.name:
The Superbians used this technology to
rip away his ability to speak!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0116
rows.name: Curse the Empire!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0117
rows.name: No, no, I don't think it's that, Uka.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0118
rows.name: I'm pretty sure that's not it.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0119
rows.name:
Please believe me when I say that
the Empire would never do that.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0120
rows.name:
His tongue is still attached, isn't it?
Even the Empire would never do that.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0121
rows.name: Maybe I was mistaken.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0122
rows.name:
I thought I was right, but I was just
wrong again.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0123
rows.name: Tora is sorry.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0124
rows.name:
Tora think all night to come up
with this method, but it was no good.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0125
rows.name: Better luck next time, Uka!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0126
rows.name:
One day you'll be able to talk to
animals and Divine Beasts, Uka.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0127
rows.name:
If you keep trying, someday
you'll succeed.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0128
rows.name:
Keep at it! As long as your heart stays
strong, there's nothing you can't do!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0129
rows.name: Thanks for the kind words!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0130
rows.name:
I might not have been able to talk to
Archelon, but I feel like I got closer
to all of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0131
rows.name:
I'm gonna keep challenging myself,
and try to live up to your expectations!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0132
rows.name:
And someday I'll make friends with
Immovable Gonzalez and we'll
go on a picnic together!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0133
rows.name: Just watch me!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0134
rows.name: Haha, one step at a time!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0135
rows.name:
A picnic, eh?
I wonder what you'd eat...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0136
rows.name:
Honestly, that seems dangerous and
unlikely.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0137
rows.name:
How is he going to go on a picnic
if he can't move?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0201
rows.name: Oh! A good point...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0202
rows.name:
It's all about having mutual empathy!
Not about the meaning of words.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0203
rows.name: Why not ask Saika?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0204
rows.name: Saika? Why?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0205
rows.name:
Saika can summon Luxurian
Divine Beast, so definitely have mutual
empathy!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0206
rows.name:
That's right - she made Genbu rise out
of the Cloud Sea!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0207
rows.name:
Good idea!
Remember what she did when we went
to Luxuria? Could you do that?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0208
rows.name:
Hmm...I had forgotten about that.
Talking to her would be a good idea.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0209
rows.name:
Great idea!
Saika can definitely help you out!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0210
rows.name: Saika, help me please!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0211
rows.name:
Yeah, but I don't think my powers
will work on anyone but Genbu...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0212
rows.name:
I have to try!
Would you teach me?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0213
rows.name: Sure, whatever.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0214
rows.name: First, place your hand on your chest.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0215
rows.name:
Allow thoughts of the Divine Beast to swell
in your mind. Then call out to it.
Gently!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0216
rows.name:
One two... One two, testing...
Can you hear me?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0218
rows.name:
Is anybody there?
I'd like to talk to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0220
rows.name: Nothing, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0221
rows.name: No reply. Ugh.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0222
rows.name: You couldn't hear anything?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0223
rows.name:
Yes, that's what I said. I couldn't
hear anything.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0224
rows.name:
Maybe it's because I don't have
the right kind of ears...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0225
rows.name: Ears?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0226
rows.name:
Yeah. Your ears are all...pointy.
Mine aren't.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0227
rows.name:
Not sure that has anything to do with it,
but Kit and Sunny have pointy ears.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0228
rows.name: Oh! That's right!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0229
rows.name:
Even though they can hear the Divine Beast,
they won't share it with me! Ugh! Rude!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0234
rows.name: I feel so betrayed!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0235
rows.name:
I didn't mean to cause any trouble...
It was really just a joke.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0230
rows.name:
*sigh*
Looks like there's some way to go
before Uka can talk to animals.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0231
rows.name:
*sigh*
Looks like there's some way to go
before Uka can talk to animals.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0232
rows.name:
*sigh*
Looks like there's some way to go
before Uka can talk to animals.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0233
rows.name:
*sigh*
Looks like there's some way to go
before Uka can talk to animals.
